name: perl-parallel-forkmanager
description: A simple parallel processing fork manager

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: braker
dependent_to.description:
BRAKER is a pipeline for unsupervised RNA-Seq-based genome annotation
that combines the advantages of GeneMark-ET and AUGUSTUS

dependent_to.name: bracken
dependent_to.description:
Bracken (Bayesian Reestimation of Abundance with KrakEN) is a highly
accurate statistical method that computes the abundance of species in
DNA sequences from a metagenomics sample.

dependent_to.name: genemark-et
dependent_to.description:
Gene Prediction in Bacteria, archaea, Metagenomes and
Metatranscriptomes. When downloaded this file is named the same for all
versions. Spack will search your current directory for the download
file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find
it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
